# BOTE

ⲃⲟϯ⳼ ↔ ⲟⲩⲱϯ to send : bide so. do sth.
ⲃⲱⲣⲡ ↔ ⲟⲩⲱⲣⲡ to send ↔ bote bear 𓂾 𓃀

𓇋 𓄋 𓊪 𓏏 𓏝 𓅆 BOTE : messenger, agent, commissioner, bystander

𓉔 𓃀 𓂻 𓈖 send to (someone)|houbtnea الخطوة AR++ ⇔ BOTEN
𓈙 𓃀 𓏴 send (message, words)|sendBote ++@heb geBoten :

𒃮𒁀𒌋 qab-ba-uᵗ •GeBote
𒃮𒁀𒌋 reporter? informer?

𓌔 𓏏 𓏥 𓏥 𓏥||the Nine Bows|vs bowtan ⇔ Boten Boaten, Ten-Bows

𓁶 𓏤 𓂾 𓏤||instructions, regulations|Verbote, Gebote …

agent < agere (“to drive, lead, conduct, manage, perform, do”).
